In 2014, Miley Cyrus starred in the television film "Party Down," and later released the documentary, "Miley: The Movement." The following year, she continued her evolution as an artist with the release of "Miley Cyrus & Her Dead Petz," an experimental album with eclectic and psychedelic influences.

Cyrus also branched out into acting with her portrayal of a Disney villain, Jynx, in "Disney Infinity 3.
